Pinyin
------

a with tones:  

* &#x101;  
* &#xE1;
* &#x1CE;
* &#xE0;

```{r variables}
a3 <- "&#x1CE;"
i3 <- "&#x1D0;"
hello <- paste0("n",i3," h",a3,"o")
cat(hello)
print(hello)
```

In-line output: `r hello`
